lines:
Guile Guy: Hail, young adventurer!
I am Guile Guy, a helpful golden chanterelle!

Guile Guy: Go find the key to the island on the lake
and defeat the evil crystal king, Pinky!

Fungus McShroom: Hold on a minute!
That sounds awfully one-sided and needlessly violent!

Guile Guy: What do you mean?
Once you walk up to those evil crystals using WASD or the arrow keys...
Fungus McShroom: What are "arrow keys"?

Guile Guy: ...and not press Space to attack,
you will see how one-sided and needlessly
violent Pinky's henchstones are!
Fungus McShroom: "Henchstones"? Really?

Guile Guy: Be sure to find my brothers!
They will teach you magic spells you can cast!
Fungus McShroom: I am a fly agaric, not some funky kind of magician!
Guile Guy: Actually, let me teach you a spell right now!

Guile Guy: If you ever get hurt, be sure to mend
your wounds using experience!

Fungus McShroom: I actually become LESS experienced
when casting magic spells?!

Guile Guy: Cast spells using Q, E and Tab
or the 1, 2 and 3 keys, numpad or not.
Fungus McShroom: Do you even react to what I'm saying?
Guile Guy: Alright, Mr. McShroom! What can I help you with?

options.text: How do you know my name?
How do I move and dash?
How do I attack and cast spells?
What was I supposed to do again?

lines: Fungus McShroom: How do you know my name?

Guile Guy: What do you mean?
It's written right there in your dialogue box.
Fungus McShroom: How do I move and dash?
Guile Guy: Move with the WASD or arrow keys.
Guile Guy: Dash by pressing the left or right shift key.

Guile Guy: Note that, if you let go of a movement key,
you will immediately look south.
Fungus McShroom: Wouldn't want to hide my pretty face.
Guile Guy: Face? What are you, some sort of animal?
Fungus McShroom: How do I attack and cast spells?
Guile Guy: Perform your default spore attack by pressing space or numpad 0.

Guile Guy: Cast spells 1, 2 or 3 with Q, E, Tab or your number keys.
The numpad works, too.

Guile Guy: Note that active spells cost experience.
You can gain experience by defeating enemies and picking up loot.
Fungus McShroom: What else can I do?

Guile Guy: Open your spellbook by pressing L.
You can activate up to three spells.
Guile Guy: Passive spells are only active when chosen in the spell menu.

Guile Guy: Press C to open your character sheet.
You can upgrade your stats with experience here.
Fungus McShroom: What was I supposed to do again?

Guile Guy: Under the mystical island in the center of
Strawberry Milk Lake lie the arcane ruins.

Guile Guy: From these underground ruins, the evil
Crystal King Pinky terrorizes the land of Cakeworld!
Fungus McShroom: Sounds reasonable.

Guile Guy: Pinky's goons have hidden the key to these ruins!
You must find the key and slay Pinky!

Fungus McShroom: Why, though?
We fungi don't really seem to fit in this world.
Are you sure violence is the solution?
Guile Guy: You must be such a fun guy at parties.
Fungus McShroom: Find key, open door, kill Pinky. Got it.
Guile Guy: You will kill the crystals, will you?
Fungus McShroom: Where are we?
Guile Guy: We are in Castle Cakeworld, last bastion of the mushroom kingdom.
Guile Guy: You may find treasures, allies and medicine if you go yeast.
Guile Guy: I mean east.

Guile Guy: Strawberry Milk Lake lies to the west.
Around it there are various locations...

Guile Guy: ...like the Chocolate Cave to the south
and the Minty Mountains to the north.

Guile Guy: Rumor speaks of a treasury to the northeast,
but it is probably guarded by crystals.
